articles.title: Miscegenation term first used - sexual relations or marriage between different races
articles.content:
Only 9 US states never had anti-miscegenation laws

Used to discredit the abolitionist movement

articles.title: Page Act: First federal immigration law
articles.content:
Prevents immigrants considered undesirable

Including Asian male contract laborers, Asian female prostitutes, and Asians convicted in their own country

articles.title: 1882, May 6th
articles.content: Chinese Exclusion Act: Banned Chinese laborers from immigrating

articles.title: Immigration Act of 1882: Targeted poor immigrants for exclusion and removal
articles.content: Immigration Act of 1882: Targeted poor immigrants for exclusion and removal

articles.title: Pace v. Alabama: US Supreme Court affirmed that Alabam's anti-miscegenation statute was constitutional

articles.content: They don't think it be like it is, but it do
